com.amplitude.api

Class PinnedAmplitudeClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplitude.api.AmplitudeClient
      • com.amplitude.api.PinnedAmplitudeClient

  • public class PinnedAmplitudeClient
extends AmplitudeClient

    PinnedAmplitudeClient

    This is a version of the AmplitudeClient that supports SSL pinning for encrypted requests. Please contact Amplitude Support before you ship any products with SSL pinning enabled so that we are aware and can provide documentation and implementation help.
